name: Mob up the road (outside of deadline)
name_original: Mob up the road (outside of deadline)
description:
Attention: this game is no longer in the race for scores. I put an extra 2h30 minutes into it, for a total of 6 hours. Somewhat distracted during the extra 2h30mins by my roof almost getting blown off by a storm.

Do like how the mini-game turned out, however.
